Posts.Content: Anyone have any tips on how to rehydrate & sooth skin after 6wks of radio
Posts.Title: skin treatment after radio

Posts.Content: Thanks will have to do a little research in French, has been doubly difficult dealing with this having to translate & make sure I have understood everything & not knowing what is available Have had some superb treatment & met some lovely people but when ill you really just want easy info in your mother tongue

Posts.Content: Hi there would love some feedback a year on from mastectomy on left deciding to have implant followed by breast reduction on right starting in Sept but keep having jitters on decision. I read that if had radiotherapy not  a good idea to have implant?
